title: Write the Equation in Standard Form
Determine Whether the Major Axis is Horizontal or Vertical
text: Since $$16<36$$ and $$36$$ is in the $$y^2$$ term, the major axis is vertical.

title: Find the endpoints of the major axis.
text: The endpoints will be the y-intercept. Since $$b^2=36$$ then $$b=-6or$$ $$b=6$$. The endpoint of the major axis are $$(0,6)$$, $$(0,-6)$$.

title: Find the endpoints of the minor axis.
text: The endpoints will be the x-intercepts. Since $$a^2=16$$, then $$a=-4$$ or $$a=4$$. The endpoints of the minor axis are $$(4,0)$$, $$(-4,0)$$.

title: Elimination of Choices
text: The graph with y-intercepts $$(0,6)$$, $$(0,-6)$$ and x-intercepts $$(4,0)$$, $$(-4,0)$$ is the answer.
